description: Создайте две переменные a = 3 и b = 5. Найдите и выведите сумму двух чисел.
description_eng: Create two variables "a" = 3 and "b" = 5. Find and print the sum of the two numbers.
solution:
a = 3
b = 5
sum = a + b
print (sum)

description: Создайте переменные total = 10 и count = 20. Если total больше count, то выведите Yes, иначе - "No"
description_eng: Create the variables "total" = 10 and "count" = 20. If "total" is greater than "count", then print "Yes", otherwise - "No"
solution:
?total = 10
count = 20
if (total > count)
	print("Yes")
else
	print("No")
